name: Love Is Hard
description:
Julian has suffered trough 5 rejections, gave up on finding his love, and became an introvert.

Early demo, the game might not be finished at all. My first ever visual novel and my first piece of literature, so i expect heavy constructive criticism.

Made with Ren'Py 8.

Chapters

Only Chapter 1 is partially done. Final game will have more.

Features

Multiple endings and routes are planned - your actions will affect this world.

Achievements - each chapter will have some and they will be related to choices you made.

Graphics - I don't have an artist yet, so the game is full of prototype graphics. If you want to hit me up with your offer feel free to do so. Though i also don't have any money, and your offer will be pretty stalled. We'll see how this game goes.
